name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Backend Engineer with over 9 years of experience, I specialize in developing scalable solutions using **PHP**, **Symfony**, **API Platform**, **MySQL**, **RabbitMQ**, **Redis**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**. I have a proven ability to lead Agile and Scrum teams in delivering robust software applications while implementing best practices in DevOps and collaborating effectively using **GitLab**. My strengths include problem-solving, adaptability, and fostering team spirit to create a productive and innovative environment focused on enhancing user experience and driving technical excellence.
